xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.7 Pañhāvāra » 16.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 16.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Vippayutta
Micchattaniyatattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Vippayutta
55.
2393Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā—  micchattaniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—  micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2394Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā—  sammattaniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—  sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2395Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—  sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. Sahajātā—  aniyatā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ—  cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa…  vatthu aniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—  aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2396Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ—  vatthu micchattaniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2397Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṃ—  vatthu sammattaniyatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
